title: internal compiler error: coherence failed to report ambiguity

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I'm not too sure if this ia compiler bug or not, but the compiler asks me to report it :)

Code:
https://github.com/reem/rust-error/ plus old_orphan_check

```
aharijanto@aharijanto-ThinkPad-X201:~/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc /home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs --crate-name error --crate-type lib -g -C metadata=1bbfbb3c68065381 -C extra-filename=-1bbfbb3c68065381 --out-dir /home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/target --emit=dep-info,link -L /home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/target -L /home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/target/deps --extern typeable=/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/target/deps/libtypeable-c9d1fd492eab7aee.rlib
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:10:16: 10:19 warning: deprecated syntax; use the `self` keyword now
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:10 use std::fmt::{mod, Show, Formatter};
                                                                                                          ^~~
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:4:12: 4:28 warning: feature is deprecated and will only be available for a limited time, please rewrite code that relies on it
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:4 #![feature(old_orphan_check)]
                                                                                                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:4:12: 4:28 warning: feature is deprecated and will only be available for a limited time, please rewrite code that relies on it
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:4 #![feature(old_orphan_check)]
                                                                                                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:84:1: 86:2 error: internal compiler error: coherence failed to report ambiguity: cannot locate the impl of the trait `core::fmt::Show` for the type `Error + 'static`
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:84 impl Show for Error {
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:85     fn fmt(&self, f: &mut Formatter) -> fmt::Result { (*self).fmt(f) }
/home/aharijanto/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/error-0.0.3/src/lib.rs:86 }
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libsyntax/diagnostic.rs:123
```
